name: katch
description: Simple module that capture errors and log it. Works both server and browser.

scripts.version:major: webpack --env.major && npm run-script && version-to-tag.sh && npm publish
scripts.version:minor: webpack --env.minor && npm run-script && version-to-tag.sh && npm publish
scripts.version:patch: webpack --env.patch && npm run-script && version-to-tag.sh && npm publish
scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
